import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../Source/Styles/Home.css' import { Context } from '../Context' import { useContext } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import api, { API_URL } from '../http' import '../Source/Styles/Transfer.css' import { useState } from 'react' import PhoneInput from 'react-phone-input-2' export default function Home(props) { const { setCurrentPage, store, setAuth } = useContext(Context) useEffect(() => setCurrentPage('/transfer'), []) const [imgTransfer, setImgTransfer] = useState('') const [imgMarks, setImgMarks] = useState('') function Validatesemseter(e) { e.target.value = e.target.value.match(/[^\d]/g, '') } return (
